Text: ...Is there really an evil spirit here?

Schools are where people of the same age gather,
where there's no shortage of inspiration, and classes
are, in a sense, where you can have time to yourself.
I believe it's where fantasies best flourish.

It's in such places that evil spirits are most likely
to be born. Perhaps they were born here, or
perhaps they were drawn here.
Does no one pay attention during class?
I get your reasoning, but where is it in the school?

We'll need to switch over to the spirit channel.
Hold on to me, both of you!
The two grab aggressively onto Nuru.
H-Hey! Not my face! Watch the faceâ€”! *muffle, muffle*

Along with Nuru's voice, Alpha and Zeta are engulfed
in light before landing in a place similar to where
they had just been.

Seriously... Didn't your parents teach you it's rude to
go for the face?!
So...where are we? Everything looks the same to me.
...Meanie.

We've switched over to the spirit channel. It looks
like the same world, but what exists inside it is
different. It's hard to explain.

Umm, is it like joining a different server in an MMO
game?
Aha! Correct you are, Zeta.
Yeah! It sorta makes sense now.
(How is that supposed to make sense?)
Wait, what the heck is that?!
Groaaarrr...
I-It's huge!
I need you two to help me take down that thing.

W-Wait a minute! How are we supposed to take down
that thing?!

It's way different from fighting a human opponent...
Oh man...

You can't beat the evil spirit in your current state.
You can now see and touch it, but your fighting
abilities haven't increased.
That's why I need you two to "awaken."
"Awaken"?

I will "challenge" both of you, so speak the words as
they come to your mind.

Don't overthink it. Just speak from your heart, and
you'll be fine. Understood?
But...

Nuru looks at them with eyes more serious than ever.
They are warm yet piercing, burning with purpose.

Nuru speaks to them in a voice more serious than ever.
It vibrates with a power difficult to imagine coming
from his small form. His tone is earnest, with no
trace of deception.

His expression differs from his usual appearance.
Faced with the power radiating from Nuru, the two
nod in agreement.
...I'll do it.
...Me too.
Alright then, here goesâ€”
Nuru turns towards Alpha.

"Child of heroes, are you prepared to walk alongside
me?"

The moment Alpha is asked this question, her heart
thumps in her chest. A surge of emotions wells inside
her, and she finds herself voicing them.

"If that's what you want, then I'll devote my life to
it."
*gasp* Huh?

Hearing Alpha's answer, the spirit turns his gaze to
Zeta.
"Do you want more power?"
"I want power...the power to hunt them down!"
Whaâ€”?!
...Very well! This is your new power!
The words flow effortlessly from Alpha and Zeta.
As if they had known them all along.

Light gathers in Alpha and Zeta's hands. These energy
particles take on forms, transforming into two weapons:
a sword and a disc.
Wh-What the?

That's Eins, the Sword of Light, and Sechs, the Disc of
Light. They will be your strength.
I feel some kinda surge of power!

Yes, me too... It feels strangely reassuring, like a
final push to ready me for the fray of battle.
Flowery language at a time like this, Alpha?
I suggest directing that sassy energy at the enemy.

You seem to have resolved yourselves. No need for
further explanation, I take it?
Now then...go forth!
Understood! You bet!
